msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" />Nice! I can totally feel the <20_2 arg="9" />-ness of your .<20_3 arg="6" />Everything here just feels like you, y'know? <20_3 arg="3" />It's like I could get to know you just by looking around.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" />Tell me,<20_3 arg="3" /> are those real mushrooms? 'Cause they sure look real!Y'know, I like mushrooms, but if some mushroom-hater walked in here, they'd probably faint!

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Hey! I gotta know, is that ?I love how it sparkles! Really cool. <20_3 arg="6" />I'm gettin' chills looking at it No, seriously.<20_3 arg="3" /> Real chills. I'm freezing!
<20_2 arg="10" />Nice !<20_2 arg="9" /> I didn't know you were into this sort of thing.<20_3 arg="6" />I just love the style, .<20_3 arg="3" /> It just makes me wanna stretch out and relax, y'know?

<20_2 arg="10" />Hmm Something about your <20_2 arg="9" /> is really speakin' to me.<20_3 arg="6" />I kinda get lost in the colors and angles.<20_3 arg="3" /> I could probably stare at this for hours, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wow! How old is your ? What a classic style!<20_3 arg="3" />Y'know,<20_3 arg="6" /> my favorite thing about antiques is imagining all the stories they can tell, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? You must really, REALLY love school or something.<20_3 arg="6" />So are you gonna offer classes?<20_3 arg="3" /> Do I need to start calling you Professor ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! I'm totally digging the beach resort vibe!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I guess I wasn't the only one who came here hoping for a tropical paradise, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So, what's with your ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Is this your office or something? Haven't you ever heard of work-life balance, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />If you're going for a nature vibe with your , it's really coming through!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I feel like there should be a birds' nest or a patch of moss or something, .
<20_2 arg="10" />Your is very<20_2 arg="9" />cute.<20_3 arg="6" />I don't know. Cute's not my favorite thing. <20_3 arg="3" />But hey, if you like it, knock yourself out, .
<20_2 arg="10" />Your makes your place look so tasty.<20_2 arg="9" /><10_4 /> I mean stylish!<20_3 arg="6" />It's just so mellow and colorful and sweet and juicy aaaaaand now I'm hungry, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? Goin' for the retro look?<20_3 arg="6" />That's awesome, !<20_3 arg="3" /> Really makes this place feel like something out of an old movie!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> Wow, .<20_3 arg="3" />I'm getting super nostalgic for my old playroom all of a sudden.<20_3 arg="6" />I used to destroy almost every toy I had. I just wanted to see what was inside! Drove my parents bonkers
<20_2 arg="10" />Nice ! <20_2 arg="9" />Island life's great for inspiration, ain't it?Oh! <20_3 arg="3" />Even kinda SMELLS like brine. <20_3 arg="6" />Nice touch, !
<20_2 arg="10" />Whoa! Nice! <20_2 arg="9" />Where'd you get ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I love the whole wood-grain vibe of everything, . It even SMELLS cool!
<20_2 arg="10" />So what's the story with your <20_2 arg="9" />?<20_3 arg="6" />You, like, nesting or something, ?<20_3 arg="3" /><10_4 /> Get it? Nesting? Bwa ha ha!
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />!<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />That's some real bottom-of-the-heart stuff. Lucky you, !

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />It's super hard not to think big thoughts when I see stuff like your here.<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Like, you ever wondered what would look like from space?Uhbesides a teeny-tiny brown dot, that is, .
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I'll be honest. I'm not really into the whole wedding thing. <20_3 arg="6" />Still, your <20_3 arg="3" />? So rad!

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Your <20_3 arg="6" />Hey, wanna hear something funny?<20_3 arg="3" /> I used to tell everyone I was gonna be a mermaid when I grew up.Or, at least, I did until my parents told me there's no such thing as mermaid college, .Whew! I was one mad .<10_4 /> Still not sure if I'm over it

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa! Check out your !<20_3 arg="6" />Hey, if you're into constellations and space and stuff, <20_3 arg="3" />I've got something I wanna ask about.Can you help me find the constellation? If there is one, that is, . No rush.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Where'd you get your sweet ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Wait, don't tell me! I wanna believe you dug up buried treasure on a rockin' high-seas adventure.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />OK, sorry for being a little weirder than usual, but I really dig how your smells.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />One sniff and I'm just, like Yeah, it's totally fall in here, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Bwa ha ha! You seriously have in here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's so awesome! I love knowin' I'm not the only big Halloween fan on , !
